Class AggregateEngineFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.vinci.leo.descriptors.AggregateEngineFactory

extends Object
    Generates elements related to UIMA Aggregate Analysis engines.

    thomasginter

    • Method Detail

      • createAggregateDescription

        public static org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription createAggregateDescription(String name,
                                                                                   List<String> primitives,
                                                                                   boolean byName)
                                                                                            throws Exception
        Create an AnalysisEngineDescriptor that represents and aggregate analysis engine from a name and a list of primitive engines.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the AggregateEngine, preferred to be a unique name though not enforced
        primitives - List of primitive engine descriptors to be included in the aggregate
        byName - Flag that indicates whether or not the list of primitives is to be imported by name or by location, true = import by name
        Returns:
        AnalysisEngineDescriptor representing an Aggregate engine
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if any errors occur

      • createAggregateDescription

        public static org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription createAggregateDescription(List<LeoDelegate> specs,
                                                                                   String name)
        Create an aggregate descriptor from a list of LeoAEDescriptor objects.
        Parameters:
        specs - LeoAEDescriptors representing the primitive engines of this aggregate
        name - String representation of the name of the aggregate
        Returns:
        AnalysisEngineDescription representation for the generated aggregate

      • createAggregateDescription

        public static org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription createAggregateDescription(List<LeoDelegate> specs,
                                                                                   org.apache.uima.flow.FlowControllerDescription flowControllerDescription,
                                                                                   String name)
        Create an aggregate descriptor from a list of LeoAEDescriptor objects.
        Parameters:
        specs - LeoAEDescriptors representing the primitive engines of this aggregate
        flowControllerDescription - allows the user to specify a custom flow controller
        name - String representation of the name of the aggregate
        Returns:
        AnalysisEngineDescription representation for the generated aggregate

      • createAggregateDescription

        public static org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription createAggregateDescription(String name,
                                                                                   List<org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceSpecifier> specs)
        Create an AnalysisEngineDescription from a name and a list of ResourceCreationSpecifiers each one representing a primitive Analysis engine, CasConsumer, or FlowController.
        Parameters:
        name - unique name of the AggregateEngine
        specs - List of primitive Engine Descriptors to be included in the aggregate
        Returns:
        AnalysisEngineDescription representing an Aggregate engine

      • bindExternalResources

        protected static void bindExternalResources(org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineDescription aed,
                         org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceCreationSpecifier spec)
        Bind external resources from the primitive spec to the aggregate AnalysisEngineDescription.
        Parameters:
        aed - Aggregate AnalysisEngineDescription to bind resources into
        spec - primitive engine spec to bind resources from

      • getComponentName

        protected static String getComponentName(org.apache.uima.resource.Parameter[] parameters)
        Pull the component name from the list of parameters. If the name is not listed then generate one in the format: leoRemoteDelegate2112{UUID}
        Parameters:
        parameters - Array of Parameter objects
        Returns:
        component name string
